page.title: 04KAYTES FARM
page.content: {Kaytes Farm}is owned by{Mr and Mrs {Shipway}who bought it 9 months ago. Parts of the building are over 300 years old.Mr Shipway works on the farm and there are some part timers.It is 101 acres which are in 11 fields,most of which are rented out.There is one cow,22 beef cattle,58 sheep,9 horses on the rented land.The family has two cats,one peahen,2 sheepdogs,gaggle of geese and a flock of ducks and hens. The main crop is grass.They feed the animals in the winter on hay, concentrates, straw and nuts.They have 2 tractors,one old,the other modern;no other implements.Foxes give trouble, they eat the poultry.The{Shipways}buy fertilizer and concentrates.They buy more cattle from Gloucester Market and learn more about farming ideas from magazines or call in advisers.
